content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I used the "google" command to search for "Brno Reservoir Trail hiking" and found websites with trail guides and reviews. I then used the "browse_website" command to gather information on the distance and difficulty level of the trail, but encountered an error. I attempted to execute a Python script to gather more information, but received an error indicating that the file could not be found.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "write_to_file", "args": {"filename": "brno_reservoir_trail.py", "text": "#!/usr/bin/env python\\n\\nimport requests\\nfrom bs4 import BeautifulSoup\\n\\nurl = \'https://www.alltrails.com/trail/czech-republic/south-moravian/stezka-brnenska-prehrada\'\\n\\nresponse = requests.get(url)\\nsoup = BeautifulSoup(response.text, \'html.parser\')\\n\\ntrail_distance = soup.find(\'span\', {\'class\': \'detail-data\'}).text\\ntrail_difficulty = soup.find(\'span\', {\'class\': \'detail-data\'}).find_next_sibling(\'span\').text\\n\\nprint(\'Distance: \' + trail_distance)\\nprint(\'Difficulty: \' + trail_difficulty)\\n"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command write_to_file returned: File written to successfully.', type='action_result')]
"""
